title: Dear League of Legender's
body:
These are your roles. Know them. Love them. Be them.

1. Mid: Kill people. (Be kill people).
2. Jungle: Useful. (Be it).
3. ADC: Don't die (Be don't die).
4. Support:
5. Top lane: Do something. (Be do something).

replies.body:
adc: be kite. learn to kite, be the kite,especially in teamfights for the love of god
all of those can apply to every other role too, except supports killing people, although in solo queue supports being a fairly strong 5th champ is probably more effective than watching top get pushed in and then get the whole massive wave dead to the turret

> [{quoted}](name=Level1Pentakill,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=vrBugsEr,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-14T00:46:16.390+0000)
>
> 5 .Top lane: Do something. (Be do something).

-.-, dw my team can rest assured that even if I'm feeding I am still doing something.
Top lane sounds so easy

Be: Kill people.
Be: Don't die.
Be: Do something. 

Be: Grammatically correct perhaps?
/thread.
